Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class MultiPlayerMode

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observable<ServerMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.MultiPlayerMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<GameEvent>
public class MultiPlayerMode
extends Game
This class extends the main class of the model Game, implementing one of the two possible modalities of Maestri del Rinascimento board game. This mode can be played by 2 to 4 players and is won by the player who gains more victory points.

      Custom constructor used for test purposes only.

    • MultiPlayerMode

      public MultiPlayerMode​(java.util.List<Player> playerList)
      Constructs a multiplayer mode game instance from the given list of players. Shuffles them in order to create a random turn logic order, then begins the setup phase of the game.
      Parameters:
      playerList - the players who will play this game.

  • Method Details

    • gameSetup

      private void gameSetup()
      Setups the game and then proceeds to the initial leader choice phase.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Proceeds to the next turn and notifies each remote view of the beginning of a new turn. If this is the last turn and all the players in game have already played their turn the game is concluded.
      Specified by:
      nextTurn in class Game

    • nextPlayer

      public Player nextPlayer​(Player currPlayer)
      Changes the current player by proceeding to the next player in positions order.
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - the player that has just played his turn.
      Returns:
      the new player in turn.

    • notifyGameSetup

      public void notifyGameSetup()
      Notifies each remote view of the players in game when the game has been setup by sending them the first simplified instance of the game.
      Specified by:
      notifyGameSetup in class Game

      Moves all the players except for the player who discarded the resources.
      Specified by:
      moveOtherPlayers in class Game
      Parameters:

    • concludeGame

      public java.util.List<Pair<User,​java.lang.Integer>> concludeGame()
      Concludes the game, computes the final rank and notifies each remote view with the final rank computed.
      Returns:
      rank computed for test purposes only.

    • activateVaticanReport

      public void activateVaticanReport​(Player triggeringPlayer, int vatican_index)
      Method called when a vatican report is activated by the triggering player on the given section. Every players check their faith track: if their Faith Marker is on a space within or beyond the activated Vatican Report section, turn the Pope's Favor tile of that section face-up, else discard the Pope's Favor tile from that section. Then notifies each remote view of the overcome of this Vatican Report activation.
      Specified by:
      activateVaticanReport in class Game
      Parameters:
      triggeringPlayer - the player who triggered the vatican report.
      vatican_index - the section index which the vatican report has been triggered on.

    • handlePlayerDisconnection

      public void handlePlayerDisconnection​(Player disconnectedPlayer)
      Handles the disconnection of a player. If the player who disconnected was the player in turn, the turn is automatically passed to the next player. If all players disconnected, the game is paused. If the player disconnected during initial choices and he had the inkwell, a new first player is computed.
      Specified by:
      handlePlayerDisconnection in class Game
      Parameters:
      disconnectedPlayer - the player who disconnected.

    • handlePlayerReconnection

      public void handlePlayerReconnection​(User reconnectingUser)
      Handles the reconnection of a player. If the game was paused and the player is the first to reconnect, the game is resumed and he starts to play as the current player. Otherwise all the other players are only notified of the reconnection.
      Specified by:
      handlePlayerReconnection in class Game
      Parameters:
      reconnectingUser - the user who reconnected.
